answers.answer: Hi,I found HCG, B12, Lipoden and Lcarnitine fat burner injections at a docotrs office in Katy. Wellness Associates of Katy at 777 S Fry Rd. their # is 281-647-9950. I started is last Thursday and had my weekly weigh in this past Friday and lost 9 pounds. I was sooo excited. They are very helpful and have a nice staff. Not just there to take your money and rush your through the visit. this is not just a fly by night weight loss clinic. they are a family practice office that specialize in weight management, diabetes and prevention. i felt very comfortable with the dr and nurse practitioner. they took their time with me and answered all of my questions.  I cant wait to go back next week to see how much I lost.Good luck!
Thanks for this information, I've been searching for days trying to locate a clinic near home.  Yeah!!!!! It just so happens that is clinic is just down the street from me.
